title: Update Budget with Committed Costs
description: A purchase order for steel has been issued. The PM must update the budget to reflect this 'committed cost'.

tasks.description: Retrieve the value of the newly issued purchase order for structural steel.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the PO value of $150,000.

tasks.description: Update the 'Structural Steel' budget line item by moving $150,000 from 'budgeted' to 'committed cost'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The budget is updated to accurately reflect that the funds are now committed.
